channel.title: Was making webclient & got errors please help
channel.description:
This is what my compiler says when i compile... please help.
client.java:4054: illegal start of expression public String name; ^ client.java:4055: illegal start of expression public String dir; ^ client.java:4057: illegal start of expression public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4057: illegal start of expression public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4057: ';' expected public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4057: ';' expected public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4057: not a statement public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4057: ';' expected public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4057: ';' expected public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4057: not a statement public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4057: ';' expected public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) ^ client.java:4068: ')' expected try{new File(signlink.findcachedir()+dir).mkdir();}catch(E xception e){} ^ client.java:4068: illegal start of expression try{new File(signlink.findcachedir()+dir).mkdir();}catch(E xception e){} ^ client.java:4068: ';' expected try{new File(signlink.findcachedir()+dir).mkdir();}catch(E xception e){} ^ client.java:4100: illegal start of expression public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException ^ client.java:4100: illegal start of expression public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException ^ client.java:4100: ';' expected public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException ^ client.java:4100: ';' expected public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException ^ client.java:4100: not a statement public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException ^ client.java:4100: ';' expected public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException ^ client.java:4100: not a statement public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException ^ client.java:4100: ';' expected public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException ^ client.java:4112: illegal start of expression public void unZipFile() ^ client.java:4112: illegal start of expression public void unZipFile() ^ client.java:4112: ';' expected public void unZipFile() ^ client.java:4136: illegal start of expression public void deleteFile() ^ client.java:4136: illegal start of expression public void deleteFile() ^ client.java:4136: ';' expected public void deleteFile() ^ 28 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Was making webclient & got errors please help
item.dc:creator: @Eclipsedz Eclipsedz
item.description:
@Eclipsedz wrote:

Mate you and me are like twins im having webclient problems too no matter how hard I try to make one it just fails
Im good with making/editing clients but FAIL badly at making webclient
my problem is turning my client I made into a webclient
Good luck mate!

Read full topic
item.source: Was making webclient & got errors please help

Well You Need To Delete What You Have Inserted Into Client.Java Delete What You’ve Put In There.
